Producer: Mark Brown, Robert Teitel, George Tillman Jr.
Screenwriter: Mark Brown, Don D. Scott, Marshall Todd
Synopsis: A smart comedy about a day in the life of a barbershop on the south side of Chicago. Calvin (Ice Cube), who inherited the struggling business from his deceased father, views the shop as nothing but a burden and a waste of his time. After selling the shop to a local loan shark, Calvin slowly begins to see his father's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he just sold it out.
Title: Barbershop
